#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

struct event {
	int id;
	int d_s,d_e;
	unsigned long long int contestents;
};

struct days {
	long int count;

};

int main()
{
	int t;
	int k,m;
	cin >> t;
	int s,e;
	long int max = 0;
	int l = 0;
	while ( t-- ) {

		cin >> k >> m;

		event olympic[k];
		max = 0;
		for ( int i = 0; i < k; i++ ) {
			olympic[i].id = i+1;
			cin >> s >> e;
			if ( e > max ) {
				max = e;
			}
			olympic[i].d_s = s;
			olympic[i].d_e = e;
			olympic[i].contestents = 0;
		}

		int n;
		int eid;
		long int c;
		for ( int i = 0; i < m; i++ ) {
			cin >> n;
			for ( int j = 0; j < n; j++ ) {
				cin >> eid >> c;
				olympic[eid-1].contestents = olympic[eid-1].contestents + c;
			}
		}
		
		days eve_sch[max+1];
		for ( int i = 0; i <= max; i++ ) {
			eve_sch[i].count = 0;
		}
		
		max = 0;

		for ( int i = 0; i < k; i++ ) {
			s = olympic[i].d_s;
			e = olympic[i].d_e;
			for ( int j = s; j <= e; j++ ) {
				eve_sch[j].count = eve_sch[j].count + olympic[i].contestents;
				if ( eve_sch[j].count > max ) {
					max = eve_sch[j].count;
				}
			}
		}
		cout << "Case " << l+1 << ": " << max << endl;
		l++;
	}


	return 0;
}
